name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar, lettuce, and tomato.

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: Crispy chicken with pickles and mayo on a brioche bun.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan and Caesar dressing.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Mozzarella, tomato sauce, and spicy pepperoni slices.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: Bell peppers, olives, onions, mushrooms and mozzarella.

name: French Fries
description: Golden and crispy shoestring fries with sea salt.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Brewed coffee over ice with milk and a touch of sweetness.

name: Pasta Bolognese
description: Slow-simmered beef ragu over al dente pasta.

name: Street Tacos
description: Three soft corn tacos with beef, onion, and cilantro.

name: Sushi Roll
description: California roll with crab, avocado, and cucumber.
